page.title: 08ELLESMERE SHOPS
page.content: There are a lot of shops in Ellesmere because we have a lot of tourists here because of the mere and canal. People like to take gifts home to their friends and family. We have a lot of food stores but we have not many clothes stores everyone goes to Oswestry to buy their clothes. There is only one toy shop but there are two that sell a few toys. There are a lot of chip shops, again maybe because we have a lot of tourists. We also have a lot of cafes, pubs and hotels mainly because of the visitors we have. We have two newsagents which is just enough for a town as big as Ellesmere.
